metadata.title: CVE-2018-1063 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Context relabeling of filesystems is vulnerable to symbolic link attack,allowing a local, unprivileged malicious entity to change the SELinuxcontext of an arbitrary file to a context with few restrictions. This onlyhappens when the relabeling process is done, usually when taking SELinuxstate from disabled to enable (permissive or enforcing). The issue wasfound in policycoreutils 2.5-11.

criterions.comment: policycoreutils package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
